comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The British Secretary of State for the Colonies, the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, MP, greeting the Liwali of Dar es Salaam, Sheikh Hemed Saleh el Busaidy, MBE, at the time of the Constitutional Conference. The Governor of Tanganyika, Sir Richard Turnbull,KCMG, is behind.

comment.author: 80709014@N03
comment._content: No, The British Secretary of State for the Colonies, the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, MP, greeting the Liwali of Dar es Salaam, Sheikh Said Bin Nasser Al-Abri, MBE, at the time of the Constitutional Conference. The Governor of Tanganyika, Sir Richard Turnbull,KCMG, is behind.
